================

### Title
Thermal Analysis System

### Reference Number
`cb-369-617278`

### Solicitation Number
`24-58004/A`

### Tender Closing Date
`2024-06-11T14:00:00`

### Description
National Research Council Canada (NRC) requires a Thermal Analysis System to upgrade characterization labs for polymeric materials. The system will be integrated into the Automotive and Surface Transportation Research Center's characterization labs, currently equipped with existing thermal analysis equipment from TA Instruments.

The following scope items are part of this package:

*   One Differential Scanning Calorimeter unit
*   One Thermogravimetric Analyzer-Mass Spectrometer unit

### Requirements

Any interested supplier must demonstrate, in the form of a statement of capabilities, that their system meets the following requirements:

#### Differential Scanning Calorimeter (DSC) Unit

*   Operational temperature range of -90°C to 725°C
*   Electrical cooling system to provide the lower -90°C temperature limit without the need for liquid nitrogen
*   54-position autosampler
*   Direct on-line Cp (heat capacity) measurement
*   User-replaceable cell
*   Dual input gas delivery manifold
*   Calibration kit
*   Sample press and appropriate pans
*   5-year warranty on DSC cells and furnace
*   Software and communication kit for instrument control and data analysis and management

#### Thermogravimetric Analyzer-Mass Spectrometer (TGA-MS) Unit

*   Operational temperature range from ambient to 1200°C
*   High-resolution TGA, modulated TGA, and auto-stepwise TGA functionalities
*   25-position autosampler
*   Dual input gas delivery manifold
*   Integrated electromagnet
*   Temperature calibration melting point standard
*   Temperature calibration as per ASTM E1582
*   5-year warranty on furnaces
*   Software and communication kits for instrument control and data analysis and management

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or to submit a statement of capabilities, please contact Paul Hewitt at `Paul.Hewitt@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca`.
